features.subheadline: Powerful features designed to declutter your mind without adding more apps to your phone.

items.title: WhatsApp | Telegram | E-mail Integration
items.description: No new apps. Use what you already love. Just forward messages to Clutter.AI.

items.title: Multi-modal
items.description: Speak, type, or snap a photo. We understand it all.

items.title: Smart Reminders
items.description: We remind you at the right time, not before, not after. Context-aware notifications.

items.title: Auto-Categorization
items.description: Bills, Tasks, Ideas – everything organized automatically in seconds.

howItWorks.subheadline: Get up and running in seconds. It's magic.

step1.title: Get Started
step1.body: First, register here on the site. Then, connect your messaging app:
step1.detailA: Find bot <1>@Dumpsterhook_bot</1>. Send your registered phone number as the first message. Wait for: '✅ Welcome! Your account has been linked'.

step2.title: Just Dump It
step2.body: Send text, voice notes, photos, or documents. We capture it all.
step2.note: You can also simply type notes, send voice messages (we transcribe them), or photos (we extract text).

step3.title: Forward Emails
step3.body: Forward emails from your registered address directly to <1>capture@inbox.theclutter.app</1>.
step3.warning: Tip: Keep only meaningful attachments to ensure accurate processing.

step4.title: Ask Your Brain
step4.body: Retrieve anything using natural language. Don't worry about typos, we understand you.

legal.privacyContent:
1. Data Collection

We collect your phone number, email address, and the content you voluntarily submit via WhatsApp, Telegram, or Email. This includes text messages, voice notes, images, and documents. We collect this data solely for the purpose of providing the Personal Assistant service, including transcription, summarization, and categorization.

2. AI Processing

You acknowledge and agree that your data is processed by third-party Artificial Intelligence models (Large Language Models) to generate summaries, extract action items, and categorize your content. Your specific personal data is NOT used to train public models.

3. Data Retention

We retain your data to provide the history and retrieval features of the service. You retain full ownership of your data. You can request the full deletion of your account and all associated data at any time by contacting us at ask@theclutter.app.

4. Security

We allow access to your data only to legitimate service processes. We employ encryption and industry-standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access.
legal.termsContent:
1. Beta Status

The Clutter.AI service is currently in a Public Beta phase. The service is provided "as is" and "as available" for testing purposes. You understand that there may be bugs, errors, or periods of downtime.

2. Free Period

As an early adopter, you are granted free access to all premium features of the service until February 28, 2026. After this date, paid plans may apply, but you will be notified in advance.

3. Fair Use

You agree not to use the service to upload illegal, harmful, threatening, or abusive content. You agree not to abuse the API or use automated bots that disrupt the service for others. We reserve the right to ban users who violate these terms.

4. Limitation of Liability

Clutter.AI is an AI-powered assistant. We are not responsible for missed deadlines, incorrect reminders, or errors in transcription generated by the AI. You should always verify critical information. We are not liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from the use of this beta service.

privacySection.title: Your Mind is Private. So is Clutter.AI.
privacySection.subtitle: We built a second brain to organize your life, not to spy on it. Here is our privacy promise:

training.title: Zero AI Training
training.description: Your data is NEVER used to train public AI models. Your memories stay strictly yours.

security.title: Secure by Design
security.description: Your data is encrypted at rest. We prioritize bank-grade security for your personal archives.

ownership.title: 100% Yours
ownership.description: You hold the keys. Export or delete your entire history anytime. Deletion is permanent.
